entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as the one who sent Stunning Spells and blocking jinxes at their pursuers. He is also mentioned as yelling 'Expelliarmus!' and identifying Stanley Shunpike as the real one.

entities.name: stanley shunpike
entities.description: Stanley Shunpike is described as having a strangely blank face when Harry sees him by the red light of his next Stunning Spell. He is also identified as the real one by Harry.

entities.name: death eater
entities.description: The Death Eaters are described as their pursuers who are being targeted by Harry's spells.

relationships.description: Harry identifies Stanley Shunpike as the real one.
Harry is attacking the Death Eaters with his spells.
